p: Insect composition varies largely due to species, diet, habitat, metamorphic stage, and processing method [ 2, 5]. Therefore, the limited data concerning L. migratoria also varies. The crude protein, fat, and ash content of the present study were similar to results reported by Osimani et al. [ 8] for whole dried locusts ( Locusta migratoria) sourced from The Netherlands. The crude protein content (50.79%) was also similar to reports by Mohamed [ 6], while other studies reported higher percentages, ranging from 55.5% to 65.9% [ 7, 18, 19].
